full_output.summary: Creative and dedicated Computer Science and Engineering student with hands-on experience in hardware interfacing, CAD design, financial management, and software development. Proven problem solver with a knack for innovative solutions and a strong team person known for effective collaboration in team-based environments. Successfully contributed to the development of a student formula race car, showcasing expertise in product development, designing, display system integration, financial oversight, and component design. Experienced Team Member bringing outstanding performance working with others to meet common goals. Familiar with project management, eager to bring knowledge to support business.

projects.name: Hangman Word Guessing Game
projects.description: An interactive and creative word guessing game using Python and the Tkinter library, focusing on user experience and game logic.

projects.name: Weather Information Website
projects.description: A web application providing real-time weather updates using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, showcasing problem-solving skills in web development.

experiences.description: Designed and analyzed various car components using CAD software, contributing to overall performance and safety enhancements through innovative solutions. Spearheaded the development of a creative user interface display technology, enhancing driver interaction and data visibility. Managed project finances, ensuring budget adherence and cost optimization through strategic financial planning and resource allocation. Coordinated cross-functional collaboration and communication to achieve project milestones. Utilized project management methodologies to streamline development processes, ensuring timely delivery of project deliverables.

full_output.name: Rishabh Kumar Jain
achievements_and_awards: Qualified for State Level India Skills Competition at NIT Delhi in Additive Manufacturing - April 2024
